author: remm
msg: - Simplified a bit the header of the generated HTML files, after
noticing some problems in Mozilla.

author: remm
msg: - Fixed the examples. The XML example won't run yet because the
XML domain config file uses the old format.

author: remm
msg: - Proper lock token handling
- Small documentation cleanups
- Added Domain.start() and Domain.stop(), and updated the JMX
wrapper so that it makes use of them
- MKCOL and PUT now should properly return 409 Conflict when
an intermediate directory is missing
- Updated the packaging style of Slide, so that the build and dist
directories are no longer swamped

author: remm
msg: - First pass at the new Slide website, which will be based on the
current XML documentation included in the nightly builds.

author: remm
msg: - A standalone DAV server is no longer included. It can still be
built using the "standalone-dist" target.
- The WAR web application is now the default way of deploying
Slide.
- Lock-null resources should now work with the filesystem store.
- Fix to the lock discovery info returned by lock, so that Office
2000 behaves correctly.
- Enhanced lock token generation.
- If header parsing (rudimentary).
- XML writer bug fix.
